concept.title: DITA API specialization
concept.shortdesc: The DITA API specialization documentation describes the Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) specialization for application programming interfaces (APIs) topic types.

conbody.p: The documentation describes the XML elements that can be used to document generic and Java API libraries using the DITA API topic types.
If you have any questions related to the content, contact Mariana Alupului (malupulu@us.ibm.com).
